These Pictures Of Deepika Attending Her Friend's Wedding As A Bridesmaid Are Surreal & Gorgeous!
For every woman, girlfriends hold a very special place in her life. Especially when someone decides to get married, girlfriends are someone the bride totally depends and counts on.
Just to jog your memory a little, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh had flown to Sri Lanka for a friend's wedding last year and now after a really long wait, the pictures are finally out.
Instagram
While we gushed over the #DeepVeer wedding pictures for months, we now have a fresh batch of pictures that will make you wish, you had a friend like Deepika on your wedding day too. Fashion designer Sabyasachi Mukherjee shared pictures from Deepika's friend Srila Rao's wedding who was also his client.
The couple tied the knot in a private beach wedding at Villa Bentota in Sri Lanka.
